title: AlarmDeactivationStateChanged (Method)
text:
METHOD AlarmDeactivationStateChanged : BOOL
This method will be called if a AlarmStateChangedListener was registered and the
alarm deactivation changed.

rows.Name: AlarmDeactivationStateChanged
rows.Comment:
<c>TRUE</c> in case the corresponding action to this event was successfull,
<c>FALSE</c> otherwise.

rows.Name: itfAlarm5
rows.Comment: The alarm which changed its deactivation state

rows: The new deactivation state of the alarm
